ComicInfo.Summary:
Hellboy is gone from the B.P.R.D. Elizabeth is now in a monastery, learning how to control her power, so she's also not in the B.P.R.D . Abe is wondering about leaving, like Hellboy and Liz did. Kate is just trying to make everything keep working the same as before, trying to convince Abe to stay. Johann beginning his work. Monks are dying in the monastry. Will Liz be okay? What's going on and why? The team is going to find out...
